M

manageMessage(Message) - Method in class com.botticelli.bot.Bot
This method read the message values and pass the message on to the appropriate method.
Message - Class in com.botticelli.bot.request.methods.types
This object represents a message.
Message() - Constructor for class com.botticelli.bot.request.methods.types.Message
 
MessageReceiver - Class in com.botticelli.messagereceiver
This object download updates for your bot and for every message call the Bot class method manage message This object can spawn threads to work messages, so if you don't want to manage parallelism build the object with threads set to 1, otherwise please set the threads to a number greater than 1.
MessageReceiver(Bot, int, int) - Constructor for class com.botticelli.messagereceiver.MessageReceiver
 
MessageReceiver(Bot, int, int, UpdateRequest) - Constructor for class com.botticelli.messagereceiver.MessageReceiver
 
MessageToSend - Class in com.botticelli.bot.request.methods
This object clusters all the data need for the method sendMessage
MessageToSend(int, String) - Constructor for class com.botticelli.bot.request.methods.MessageToSend
